archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.3.9d: d) reconciling restored versions to the live version when copies are taken (e.g. by checking file size, using hash totalling or deploying other methods of verification).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
